overview:
Alex oversees the account management, strategic planning, and technical execution of digital projects at SolutionSet.

With a focus on optimizing business strategies and processes, Alex has found the right technical solutions for clients such as Stanford University, eBay, EFI, and TiVo. His proven methodology serves as the foundation for successful digital marketing campaigns, websites, and community development projects.

Alex has held key management roles with innovative web development companies across Silicon Valley, including Intend Change, Liquid Thinking, USWeb, and Networkers.
